title: ESA result
content: What happens if you get 39.5 in (ESA+ISA + assignments)will they consider it 40 or they'll put F grade.

comments.body: Unlikely anyone will know since all that is given to you during results is your final grade. I am assuming they will pass you but everything is speculation
Even 39.1 is rounded off to 40. So it's a pass. I know this cuz I got 46.25 in one subject and it is taken as 47
Ig you are only taking about your internals I'm talking about esa marks + ISA marks including assignments and projects.
Your marks under final Isa is shown out of 50? Is that the case for every subject too?
Mostly that also will be rounded off to the ceiling value.
